com.cloudera.director.spi.v2.provider

Interface CloudProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCloudProvider

    public interface CloudProvider
    A cloud provider, which may support multiple cloud resource types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResourceProvider createResourceProvider(String resourceProviderId, Configured configuration)
      Returns the specified resource provider, using the specified configuration.
      LocalizationContext getLocalizationContext()
      Returns the cloud localization context.
      CloudProviderMetadata getProviderMetadata()
      Returns the cloud provider metadata.
      void validateResourceProviderConfiguration(String name, ResourceProviderMetadata resourceProviderMetadata, Configured configuration, PluginExceptionConditionAccumulator accumulator)
      Validates the specified configuration, accumulating errors and warnings in the specified accumulator.

        Returns the cloud provider metadata.

        the cloud provider metadata

        Returns the cloud localization context.

      • validateResourceProviderConfiguration

        void validateResourceProviderConfiguration(String name,
                                           ResourceProviderMetadata resourceProviderMetadata,
                                           Configured configuration,
                                           PluginExceptionConditionAccumulator accumulator)
        Validates the specified configuration, accumulating errors and warnings in the specified accumulator.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the object being validated
        resourceProviderMetadata - the resource provider metadata
        configuration - the configuration to be validated
        accumulator - the exception condition accumulator

      • createResourceProvider

        ResourceProvider createResourceProvider(String resourceProviderId,
                                        Configured configuration)
        Returns the specified resource provider, using the specified configuration.
        Parameters:
        resourceProviderId - the resource provider ID, as returned by its metadata
        configuration - the configuration
        Returns:
        the specified resource provider, using the specified configuration
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if the cloud provider does not have a resource provider with the specified ID
